Detailed Description

Class for automatic binning.

Contains list of TBin objects. Probably many members here that should better belong to TMiniNtupleAnalyzer...

Member Data Documentation

Double_t TGlobalBin::fWeightingFactor [private]

Weighting factor for histograms filling. Is used to scale charm distribution when adding up samples with different q2-min-cut
